 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּחַ‎</span> **noun masculine** ==tablet, board or plank, plate== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לוּחָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; (modern pronunciation <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***lûµ, lôµ***</u></abbr>, compare e.g. Spiro<sup>Arab.-Eng. Vocab.</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]), Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, but Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***li±û***</u></abbr> (as if from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לחה‎</span>) in [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 366</sup>; see, however, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***lêjum (lêyum)***</u></abbr> Jäger<sup>BAS i, 486</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> absolute [[Isa.30.8|Isa 30:8]] construct [[Prov.3.3|Prov 3:3]] + 4 t.; dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֻחֹתָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Ezek.27.5|Ezek 27:5]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוחֹת‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֻחוֺת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֻחֹת‎</span>) absolute [[Exod.32.16|Exod 32:16]] + 17 t.; construct [[Deut.4.13|Deut 4:13]] + 16 t.; — 

**1.** chiefly of stone tablets on which ten words were written [[Exod.24.12|Exod 24:12]]; [[Exod.31.18|Exod 31:18]]b; [[Exod.32.16|Exod 32:16]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.32.19|Exod 32:19]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.34.1|Exod 34:1]] (3 t. in verse); [[Exod.34.4|Exod 34:4]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.34.28|Exod 34:28]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.4.13|Deut 4:13]]; [[Deut.5.19|Deut 5:19]]; [[Deut.9.9|Deut 9:9]]; [[Deut.9.10|Deut 9:10]]; [[Deut.9.11|Deut 9:11]]; [[Deut.9.17|Deut 9:17]]; [[Deut.10.1|Deut 10:1]]; [[Deut.10.2|Deut 10:2]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.10.3|Deut 10:3]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.10.4|Deut 10:4]]; [[Deut.10.5|Deut 10:5]]; [[1Kgs.8.9|1Kgs 8:9]]; [[2Chr.5.10|2Chr 5:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֵדֻת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Exod.31.18|Exod 31:18]]a; [[Exod.32.15|Exod 32:15]] compare v[[Exod.34.29|Exod 34:29]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבְּרִית‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Deut.9.9|Deut 9:9]]; [[Deut.9.11|Deut 9:11]]; [[Deut.9.15|Deut 9:15]] tablet for writing prophecy [[Isa.30.8|Isa 30:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(סֵפֶר‎</span>, [[Hab.2.2|Hab 2:2]], and figurative, b&gt;<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּחַ לָבְּךָ‎</span> [[Prov.3.3|Prov 3:3]]; [[Prov.7.3|Prov 7:3]] (for writing wise counsel), compare [[Jer.17.1|Jer 17:1]] (inscribing sin of Judah); (verb mostly <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּחַב‎</span> [[Exod.32.15|Exod 32:15]];  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Exod.34.1|Exod 34:1]]; [[Exod.34.28|Exod 34:28]]; [[Deut.4.13|Deut 4:13]]; [[Deut.5.19|Deut 5:19]]; [[Deut.10.2|Deut 10:2]]; [[Deut.10.4|Deut 10:4]]; [[Prov.3.3|Prov 3:3]]; [[Prov.7.3|Prov 7:3]]; [[Isa.30.8|Isa 30:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרַשׁ עַל‎</span> [[Jer.17.1|Jer 17:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרַת‎</span> followed by accusative [[Deut.9.9|Deut 9:9]] compare [[1Kgs.8.9|1Kgs 8:9]] = [[2Chr.5.10|2Chr 5:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרַת עַל‎</span> [[Exod.32.16|Exod 32:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּאֵר עַל‎</span> [[Hab.2.2|Hab 2:2]]). 

**2.** wooden ***boards***, composing altar of tabernacle [[Exod.27.8|Exod 27:8]]; [[Exod.38.7|Exod 38:7]] ***planks*** composing ship (figurative of Tyre) [[Ezek.27.5|Ezek 27:5]] cf, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצוּר עָלָיהָ לוּחַ אָ֑רֶז‎</span> [[Song.8.9|Song 8:9]], of door. 

**3.** (metal) ***plates*** on bases of lavers in Solomon's temple [[1Kgs.7.36|1Kgs 7:36]].
